jmplib.asm.util

Class ASMUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • jmplib.asm.util.ASMUtils

  • public class ASMUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to encapsulate the most common ASM operations
    Version:
    1.1 Code refactoring, simple type - Class map.
    Author:
    Ignacio Lagartos, Jose Manuel Redondo

        This method transforms a Type to Class object.
        Parameters:
        type - The Type object to transform.
        Returns:
        The Class represented by the Type object or null if the type doesn't represent a valid Class.
